footers: Nature is not only stranger than we imagine; it is stranger than we can imagine
The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you
It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data
Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change
The world to me was a secret, which I desired to divine
Learn from me how dangerous is the acquirement of knowledge
All we're doing is engineering biology to do what it's always done, only better
We are as gods and might as well get good at it
What I cannot create, I do not understand
